Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='PP99')

BibliographicData.Title: Dorsolateral prefrontal cortex: comparative cytoarchitectonic analysis in the human and the macaque brain and corticocortical connection patterns

BrainSite.FullName: Area 24c (rostral part of the cingulate sulcus)

Reference.Quotation: "In this case, two DY injections were placed into the rostral partof dorsal area 6 (i.e. 6DR)." (p. 1020)
"In case 4, the DY injections were placed in area 9 on the lateral surface of the frontal cortex (Fig. 11A)." (p. 1028)
"In this case, DY injections were placed in area 46 on the lip of the middle part of the sulcus principalis (Fig. 14A)." (p. 1031)

"In two animals, injections of FB were placed in lateral 8B as defined by Walker (1940) (Fig. 2A) and the present segmentation (Fig. 3B). The pattern of distribution of labelled neurons was similar in these two animals and therefore only one of these is presented here as case 2 (Fig. 9)." (pp. 1024-1025)
"In this case, the FB injections were placed in area 8Av in the ventral part of the concavity of the arcuate sulcus (Fig. 10A)." (p. 1028)
"In this case, FB injections were placed in area 8Ad in the concavity of the arcuate sulcus (Fig. 12A)." (p. 1028)
"In case 6, FB injections were placed in area 9/46d on the lip of the upper bank of the sulcus principalis (Fig. 13A)." (p. 1028)
"In case 8, FB injections were placed in the rostralmost part of dorsal area 46, close to area 10 (Fig. 15A)." (p. 1031)
